name: SOCY 3B
title: Statistical Methods
description: Introduces basic quantitative data analysis found in sociological research and policy reports. Topics include: inferential statistics, such as probability distributions, sampling, and testing; and descriptive statistics, such as measures of association, bivariate, and multivariate analysis.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to majors, proposed majors, and minors in sociology, global information and social enterprise, and Latin American studies/sociology combined.

class_notes: Enroll in lecture and associated secondary lab. In-person and remote lab options are available
